```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(knitr)
opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
```


```{r}
library(ggCyto)
data(GvHD)
fs <- GvHD[1:5]


```

## 1d histogram/density
```{r}
# histogram for raw flow data
autoplot(fs, aes(x = `FL1-H`)) + geom_histogram()

# add transformation
autoplot(fs, aes(x = `FL1-H`)) + geom_histogram() + scale_x_log10()

# change the border colors 
autoplot(fs, aes(x = `FL1-H`)) + geom_histogram(colour = "white") + scale_x_log10()

# change the bin width
autoplot(fs, aes(x = `FL1-H`)) + geom_histogram(colour = "white", binwidth = 5/100) + scale_x_log10()
```

## 2d scatter
```{r}
#transform the data
fs <- transform(fs, estimateLogicle(fs[[1]], colnames(fs)[-c(1:2)]))

autoplot(fs, aes(x = `FL1-H`, y =  `FL2-H`)) + geom_density2d()

```
